HomePage.tagline: Your ultimate platform for student quizzes and announcements.
HomePage.description: Stay updated with the latest announcements and test your knowledge with interactive quizzes designed for your current semester.
HomePage.examTimeText1: Here we are. Are you ready to fight? Don't worry, we prepared some tips to be ready for your exam.
HomePage.examTimeQuote: "The only way to do great work is to love what you do."

DashboardPage.announcementsDescription: Stay informed with the most recent updates from your school.
